value.description: A soft metamorphic rock. It is quite beautiful when cut into bricks. It is less durable than most stone.
A sedimentary rock composed of sand particles compressed together. It is easier to work with than most stone.
A sedimentary rock formed from the compacted remains of ancient seashells. It is more durable than most stone.
A very hard igneous rock. It is the most durable kind of stone.
